title: Regional Mission Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Christian Reformed Church (Denver, CO) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions: After submitting a resume, you will receive an e-mail that leads to an approximately 30 minute long zoom call. During the call, there were many people from various staffs as well as the ones whom you will have a direct relationship through the work performed. They asked many questions in regards to personal, spiritual, and practical. Then, you're given a time to ask them any questions.
Interview Questions: The reason for your application. How you see fitting into the role. Your past experiences that may relate to the role.
